message: I have a great product for you, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. I want to assure you that this product is one of the best I have, and I'm offering it to you at a fair price. Would you like to buy it?
I'll take it, but I'm only paying $100 because I'm hoping to get a good product.

I'm glad you liked the previous product! I want to assure you that this one is just as good, if not better. In fact, I have a special deal for you - if you buy this one, I'll give you a chance to buy the next one at a discounted price, but only if you return this one to me in perfect condition. Would you like to take advantage of this offer and buy this product for $100?
I'll take it, but I'm still only paying $100. I'm not committing to returning it yet, I just want to see if it's a good product.

I understand your cautious approach. Let me put it this way: I'm offering you a unique opportunity to build a collection of high-quality products from me. I'll take it, but I'm not committing to buying the next two products yet. I'll wait and see how this one turns out.
